price: Disseram: "Pressentimos mau agouro por causa de ti e de quem está contigo." Disse: "Vosso agouro é junto de Allah. Mas, sois um povo que está sendo provado."
arabic: قَالُواْ ٱطَّيَّرۡنَا بِكَ وَبِمَن مَّعَكَۚ قَالَ طَٰٓئِرُكُمۡ عِندَ ٱللَّهِۖ بَلۡ أَنتُمۡ قَوۡمٞ تُفۡتَنُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: qālū iṭṭayyarnā bika wabiman maʿaka qāla ṭāirukum ʿinda al-lahi bal antum qawmun tuf'tanūna
translations: We consider you a bad omen
We consider you a bad omen
